name: oci_set_prefetch
purpose: Sets number of rows to be prefetched by queries

return.description: Returns TRUE on success or FALSE on failure.

notes.description:
In PHP versions before 5.0.0 use ocisetprefetch instead. The old function name can still be used
in current versions, however it is deprecated and not recommended.

changelog.change: Before this release, rows must be >= 1.

Before this release, prefetching was limited to the lesser
         of rows rows and 1024
         * rows bytes.  The byte size
         restriction has now been removed.
